data.message: Have you guys reconsidered the whole Facebook Messenger thing? The app is incredibly inconvenient and the whole "holding messages hostage"  until we download the app is really bad. I guess since you have the market cornered for social media you can do as you please, but please consider ditching this. 2 facebook apps is redundant. Also those chat heads really creep me out

replies.message: Thank you for your feedback, Adam. We're hard at work on continued improvements to the Messenger app. If there's something that we could do to improve your experience, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1v91OIA -Chantal
